name: Lenster
intro: Social media app built by Lens Protocol
introduce: Lenster is a decentralized, permissionless social media application built by Lens Protocol. Lenster runs on the Polygon network and only requires the user to submit a username (chosen by the user) and wallet address, and does not collect any sensitive information, providing users with good privacy. Additionally, Lenster hosts data in the decentralized file storage system IPFS, which means there is no downtime and no one can DDoS the platform.
